Description: Unique identifier for the fundamental traceability unit
Business identifier (log number tag barcode QR code)
Type of traceable unit (individual_log pile volume_aggregation processed_batch)
Product type (sawlog pulpwood biomass chips firewood veneer_log post_pole)
Quality classification (Grade-A through Grade-D Premium Standard)
Whether unit contains multiple wood species
Technology Readiness Level for identification method (1-9)
Alternative baseline scenario metrics (decay rate carbon impact)
When the traceable unit was first created
Reference to parent unit for splits/transformations
References to child units created from splits
Current location of the traceable unit
Original harvest location (required for origin tracking)
Individual operator who handled the unit
Method used for identification (RFID QR barcode biometric)
How biometric was captured (optical_scanner photo_analysis manual_photo visual_inspection)
Reference to the traceable unit being identified
Unique identifier for the tracking location
Type of location (harvest_site skid_road forest_road mill_entrance processing_facility)
Additional details about the tracking point
Physical location of the tracking point
Organization that manages this tracking point
Unique identifier for location history record
Type of movement (transport processing storage delivery)
Reference to the unit being tracked
Location at this point in time
How measurement was taken (manual_scale optical_scanner load_cell truck_scale)
Last calibration date of measurement equipment
Reference to the unit being measured
Unique identifier for the identification method
Type of method (RFID QR_code barcode biometric trip_ticket)
Type (harvester processor certifier transporter supplier manufacturer producer importer blender distributor)
LCFS classification (producer importer blender distributor not_regulated)
Annual production or handling capacity with unit
Power purchase agreement identifier with utility
Utility company purchasing power under BioRAM
Air quality management district permit identifier
Whether within California State Responsibility Area
BioRAM program status (qualified pending suspended not_eligible)
CAL FIRE fire hazard severity (Very High High Moderate Low)
CAL FIRE unit or jurisdiction for facility
List of geographic areas where organization operates
List of certification IDs held by organization
Type of operator (harvester truck_driver equipment_operator inspector)
Type of customer (wholesaler retailer end_user manufacturer)
Standard payment terms for this customer
Type (harvester forwarder loader scanner chipper debarker truck trailer)
Common species for this material type
Processing methods applicable to this material
Type (felling delimbing crosscutting chipping debarking sawing drying pelletizing)
Scientific or common name of species
Size or weight of sample tested
How value was determined (lab_test calculation estimation)
Unique identifier for the business transaction
Total monetary value of the transaction
Currency code (USD EUR GBP CAD JPY AUD CHF SEK NOK)
Incoterms delivery conditions (FOB CIF DDP EXW FCA CPT DAP FAS)
Current status (pending confirmed delivered completed cancelled disputed)
Detailed financial terms (down payment retention late fees discounts)
Risk terms (force majeure quality guarantees insurance dispute resolution)
Volume of fuel in transaction for LCFS reporting
LCFS role (producer importer blender distributor not_applicable)
Volume of biomass fuel for BioRAM reporting
Geographic coordinates of biomass fuel origin
Identifier for source facility or harvest site
Whether fuel source is within California SRA
CAL FIRE designation (Very High High Moderate Low)
Source of fire hazard zone verification
Transportation distance from source to facility in miles
Legal landowner of biomass source location
Assessor parcel number or legal land description
CAL FIRE permit number for harvest activities
Timber harvest plan identifier if applicable
Name and title of person attesting to BioRAM compliance
BioRAM pathway for biomass power generation
Array of transactions in this batch
URL or path to document file
Array of TRUs in this product group
Type (FSC PEFC SFI SBP ISO ISCC)
Certification schemes this body is authorized for
Reference to traceable unit for the claim
Description of supply base area and characteristics
Unique identifier for supply base report
Unique identifier for mass balance account
Energy economy ratio for LCFS credits
Date pathway was certified by CARB
Unique identifier for LCFS report (LCFS-RPT-YYYY-QN-XXX format)
Total fuel volume in reporting period
When report was submitted to CARB
Unique identifier for BioRAM report (BIORAM-RPT-YYYY-QN-XXX format)
Total biomass volume in bone dry tonnes
When report was submitted to CEC
